post.description: Generate an access token for Dwolla's Connect API

get.description: Entrypoint to Dwolla's API. Can be used to fetch Account, Funding Sources, and more.

post.description:
Create a Funding Source that is attached to your Main Account.

The created Funding Source can be used as the `sender` for `debit` Transfers, or as the `destination` for `credit` Transfers.

get.description: Get Account by ID
List all Funding Sources that have been created for your Main Account.
List all Transfers that have been created by your Main Account.

failureReason.description: Invalid combination of ACH company ID and funding source
failureReason.explanation: The requested funding source and treasury account combination is invalid. Check funding source and treasury account for accuracy and re-add if necessary

post.description: Create a business or personal External Party, to which a Funding Source can be later attached.

get.description: List all External Parties that have been created by your application.
Retrieve basic deails about an exernal party by ID.

post.summary: Create Funding Source for External Party
post.description:
Create a bank Funding Source that's attached to an External Party.

A Funding Source is required when creating a Transfer, as a sender or destination.

get.summary: List Funding Sources for External Party
get.description: List all Funding Sources that your application has created for an External Party.

post.summary: Create exchange for an External Party
post.description: Create exchange for an External Party

get.summary: List exchanges for an External Party
get.description: List exchanges for an External Party
List all Transfers that that belong to an External Party.

failureReason.description: Invalid combination of ACH company ID and funding source
failureReason.explanation: The requested funding source and treasury account combination is invalid. Check funding source and treasury account for accuracy and re-add if necessary

get.description: Get detailed information of a Funding Source by its ID.
List exchange partners
Retrieve exchange partner
List exchanges for an Account
Retrieve exchange resource

post.description:
Create a new Transfer, sending money from a `source` Funding Source to a `destination` Funding Source.

If the sender Funding Source has a `treasuryAccount` link, the Transfer type will be `credit`; otherwise, if the `treasuryAccount` link is on the destination Funding Source, the Transfer type will be `debit`.

get.description: Get detailed information of a Transfer by ID.

failureReason.description: Invalid combination of ACH company ID and funding source
failureReason.explanation: The requested funding source and treasury account combination is invalid. Check funding source and treasury account for accuracy and re-add if necessary

post.description: Create a Treasury Account that can be attached to a Funding Source.

get.description: List all Treasury Accounts that have been created by your application.
Get detailed information of a Treasury Account by ID.
Get detailed information of a Transfer Partner by its UUID.
List all Transfer Partners that Dwolla currently supports.

post.description: Create a webhook subscription to receive POST requests from Dwolla (called webhooks) when events associated with your application occur.

get.description: List all Webhook Subscriptions that belong to an application.
Get a Webhook Subscription by ID

delete.description: Delete a webhook subscription to stop receiving POST requests from Dwolla webhooks.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of Webhook Subscription to delete

get.summary: List Webhooks for a Webhook Subscription
get.description: List all Webhooks fired for a Webhook Subscriptions

Location.description: URL of the successfully created resource
